_header: He that intendeth in his heart to seek
_description: John Lydgate, A praise of St. Anne — two stanzas rhyme royal

CamTCC601.First Lines:
he that intendeth in hys hert to sekeTo loue the doughtyr of any
                    woman fre…
CamTCC601.Last Lines:
…Thys blyssyd maydyn and her modyr fredelyueryng hys sowle
                    from all aduersite Amen
CamTCC601.Attributed Author:
Lydgate (added after rubric by later hand, possibly
                    Stow’s)

BLHar2251.First Lines:
HE that intendith in his hert to sekeTo love the doughter of any
                    womman fre…
BLHar2251.Last Lines:
…This blessid mayden and hir moder freDelyueryng his soule
                    from all aduersite
BLHar2251.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. I: Religious Poems.
EETS
         e.s. 107 (1911; repr. 1961): 130.
